subject: Urgent: Q3 Report Required
body: Hi, I need the Q3 financial report on my desk by Friday 5 PM. This is critical for the board meeting. Please ensure all spreadsheets are attached.

subject: The Future of AI is Here
body: In this week's issue: Google Gemini takes over the world, Python 3.14 rumors, and 5 tips to code faster. Click here to read more.

subject: Interview Follow-up: Senior Developer Role
body: Hello, we loved your assignment submission! We would like to schedule a final round interview next Tuesday at 10 AM. Please let us know your availability.

subject: CONGRATS! YOU WON $1,000,000
body: You have been selected as the grand prize winner. Send us your bank details immediately to claim your prize. act fast!

subject: Sunday Dinner?
body: Are you coming home this weekend? Dad is making lasagna. Let me know so I can buy ingredients.

subject: Project Deadline Extension
body: We are running behind on the assets. Can we push the deadline to next Monday? Let me know if that works for your team.
